attributes.action: Stop west Berkshire council take away the dog bins in linear park (East)
attributes.background: Get West Berkshire to reverse there decision on what they propose for they 2024/25 financial year

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about this issue are a matter for your local authority, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
